Category:Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Patrick Coyle provided the voice for Kir Kanos in the audio dramatization of Crimson Empire. He also voiced Nathan Donar III in Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama, an unnamed bounty hunter in Dark Forces: Rebel Agent audio drama and both a speeder pilot and an Imperial co-pilot in Dark Forces: Jedi Knight audio drama.
